title: Increase friend-list
body:
I have been playing League of Legends since the end of season 1 and I have maximum friends on league and it's really frustrating having to delete people to make room for others and sometimes drama occurs.
I think it would be an awesome idea to raise the maximum friend-list or have no cap :)! 
I am on a few of the League of Legends community pages on facebook, I like playing with different people and making new friends.
I have contacted Riot and they told me to share this idea on here :)!!!!

replies.body: I actually don't mind, most of the poison that I play with I don't even want on my friends list. They just liked me cuz I carried from time to time.

I totally agree on this! I've added a lot of people from like Facebook groups to play and have fun with and it's really annoying to have to delete people :(
Raising the max friends list at least would be really good!
